resources.string: Anti Corona
GET YOURSELF TESTED FOR COVID-19 NOW!
Start
BE SAFE! IT\'S COMING.

"Here we will ask you some questions and based on your response to them, we may determine what are your chances of being infected by corona virus. The end results may be different than clinical reports. Our test is based only on assumptions and appeared cases.
TAKE A SIMPLE TEST TO SEE YOUR CHANCES OF BEING INFECTED.
SYMPTOMS
PRECAUTIONS
SEE CURRENT SATISTICS
Do you have fever ?
Do you have cough ?
Do you have headache ?
Do you face trouble while breathing ?

This test was completely based on assumptions and calculations. We strongly encourage you to go for a proper clinical test.

You Are Safe!But a clinical test would be essential. Your chances of being infected are
Go for a checkup immediately! You may be infected. Your chances of being infected are
If you have fever as high as 103 or 104 f, you have a high chance of covid-19 infection.
Dry cough is a sign of infection and a clinical test is recommended.
If you face difficulty in breathing, then yes get yourself checked up.
Covid-19 can cause prolonged weakness in patients.
Wash your hands every two hours. This app is equipped with a remainder that would pop up every 30 minutes to remind you the same.
Maintain social distancing to help reduce the spread of the disease.
Use masks while going out or if suffering from flu.
Cover your mouth while you cough.
ANTI CORONA
